name: Acrophobia
description:
Do you have a courage to walk on the steel frame?　In this game, you should walk on the steel frame which is put between two high building.
I don't recommend to see under the steel frame. You may feel fear and you are going to fall to the ground.
The purpose of this game is that walking to the final building. If you reach on the final building, you will be cerebrated.

How to play
※This game can be played using only HTC Vive or Vive Pro.
Firstly, please check under your feet. You can see a circular shape shadow. It will be your shadow.
Then, please put the your feet on the shadow and don't get off from shadow.
You can move by pressing trigger of the Vive controller. You can move in the direction which you are watching.
